name: Hanoi Rest n Go
address: Anh  o 6 Number 23, Vinhomes Riverside, Long Bien, Long Bien District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set in Giảng Vũ, this air-conditioned villa features free WiFi and a terrace. The property boasts views of the garden and is 6 km from Hanoi. Free private parking is available on site.

There is a seating area, a dining area and a kitchen equipped with oven. A flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as an iPod docking station and a laptop are featured. Other facilities at Hanoi Rest n Go include a spa centre.

Free use of bicycles and car hire are available at the property and the area is popular for golfing. A range of activities are offered in the area, such as cycling and fishing. Noi Bai International Airport is 22 km from the property.
